body: I think this only fixed part of the problem: We now correctly go to the clone page on the first click, instead of requiring two clicks, but the clone page still doesn't include a revision id, like I would expect. This has the affect of always cloning the latest revision. If you go to an older revision, and click the clone button, you get the latest revision's data in the fields. Is this the expected behavior?
